name: Eternal Flower:Red
description:
The continuation of Eternal Flower: Prologue

(https://altila.itch.io/ef-prolog)

Synopsis:

Chronos and Scarlet managed to turn back the time. This time, Scarlet wanted to prevent the previous tragedy caused by her father's obsession with the [Chronos Watch].

Warning: 

Character death

Features:

Route: Red, Snake, Bad Ending

Bad ending? Just retry but from the start! Up to 11x
